overview: Sean Galusha is an entrepreneur, B2B sales expert, and President of Localize Internet Marketing, LLC. Sean started his first online business at the age of 19, and has since gone on to start over 10 highly-profitable online businesses by utlizing his Internet marketing skills. In addition to his own business success, Sean Galusha has managed over $300,000 in paid search spend for both small businesses and large corporations, delivering a huge impact to their bottom line.
